title: Finish Action
content:
The finish action completes the current task and exits the cognitive loop.

## Parameters

This action takes no parameters.

## Usage

Use this action when:
- The requested task has been completed
- A response has been sent to the user
- No further actions are needed

## Examples

```json
{
  "action": "finish",
  "params": {}
}
```

## Common Patterns

1. After sending a response:
   ```json
   [
     {"action": "send_message", "params": {"to": "user", "content": "..."}},
     {"action": "finish", "params": {}}
   ]
   ```

2. After completing a computation:
   ```json
   [
     {"action": "execute_python", "params": {"code": "..."}},
     {"action": "send_message", "params": {"to": "user", "content": "..."}},
     {"action": "finish", "params": {}}
   ]
   ```
